info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:44PM CDT until June 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BUFFALO AND SOUTHERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Litchfield, or 29 miles southeast of Broken Bow, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 70 MPH winds near Litchfield at 740 PM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Ravenna, Pleasanton, Litchfield, Rockville, Hazard and Poole. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
